special_text:
Ashiok enters with a loyalty counter for each type of mage creature you control. [i](Druids, Shaman, Warlocks, and Wizards are mages.)[/i]
[+1]: Each player loses 2 life.
[-2]: Search your library for a Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
